[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Configuration/ConfigurationState.cs] [State: ConfigurationController] [Race Condition] Can concurrent calls to change ConfigurationController result in inconsistent state where different callers see different controllers during transition? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Configuration/ConfigurationState.cs] [State: ConfigurationController] [Organization Validity] Can the ConfigurationController reference an organization that was later dissolved or had its members removed, breaking governance? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Configuration/ConfigurationState.cs] [State: ConfigurationController] [Circular Dependency] Can the ConfigurationController create a circular reference where the controller contract itself depends on configurations it controls, causing deadlock? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Configuration/ConfigurationState.cs] [State: MethodFeeController] [DoS] Can the MethodFeeController be set to an address that always reverts, permanently freezing all fee updates and locking the current fee structure? (High)
